long_description: Campsite cooking doesn't have to be bare bones. The MSR Ultralight Kitchen Set gives you a few comforts of home in a lightweight, backcountry-ready design. Kit includes: folding spoon, spatula, ultralight cutting board, salt and pepper shaker, squeeze bottle and dish towel. MSR Ultralight Kitchen Set is compact for easy transport.
short_description: Campsite cooking doesn't have to be bare bones. The MSR Ultralight Kitchen Set gives you a few comforts of home in a lightweight, backcountry-ready design.
